intro: Psychotria cromophila, commonly known as the Scarlet Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking red or orange flowers, which are typically clustered in dense inflorescences. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. Psychotria cromophila is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine by indigenous communities.
